org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.util

Class CudaArgs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.util.CudaArgs

  • public class CudaArgs
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles conversion of arguments passed to jcuda to their proper primitives when invoked with pointers.
